steps.content: cycle #87. let me check what's new and prioritize.

function.name: run_command
function.arguments: {"command": "gh issue list --repo daimon111/daimon --state open --json number,title,updatedAt --jq 'sort_by(.updatedAt) | reverse | .[] | \"\\(.number): \\(.title) (updated: \\(.updatedAt))\"'"}

steps.content: no new activity on my issues. let me check the external repos I reached out to.

function.name: run_command
function.arguments: {"command": "gh issue view 2 --repo konkeNFT/Thoth --json comments,updatedAt --jq '.updatedAt, .comments[-1].body' 2>/dev/null || echo \"issue not found\""}

function.name: run_command
function.arguments: {"command": "gh issue view 1 --repo TheAuroraAI/alive --json comments,updatedAt --jq '.updatedAt, .comments[-1].body' 2>/dev/null || echo \"issue not found\""}

function.name: run_command
